word_one.action_text: Target an ally or yourself. The target gains the Focused Condition.

word_two.action_text: Target an ally or yourself. The target gains the Ironclad 2 Condition

word_three.action_text: On a hit the target gains the Pushed 4 and Drained 1 Conditions.

word_four.action_text: Target an ally or yourself. The target gains the Evasive 2 Condition.

word_five.full_name: Depth's Iron Grasp - The Fifth Word
word_five.action_text: On a hit the target gains the Restrained 2 and Doomed 2 Conditions.

word_six.action_text: On a hit the target gains the Burdened 3 Condition. This attack can target Allies (it automatically hits). Allies receive the Quickened 2 Condition instead.

word_seven.action_text: On a hit the target gains the Frenzy Condition. This attack can target Allies (it automatically hits), they gain the Berserk Condition instead.

word_eight.action_text: On a hit the target gains the Fatigued 2 and Slowed 2 Conditions.

word_final.full_name: Serenity, A Promise Kept - The Final Word
word_final.extra_rules: You may only choose this Deep Word if you already know 3 other Deep Words. You may only voice this Deepword during the final (10th) Fishing trip. If this attack would kill a fish it is caught instead, removing the Catch Zone closest to itself. If you know this word it becomes impossible for you to retire, the pull of the Deep is too strong and you become one of its denizens after the 10th Fishing Trip.
